Info.Title: Kick
Info.Writer: Vakkantham Vamsi (story), Rajat Arora (screenplay), Keith Gomes (screenplay), Sajid Nadiadwala (screenplay), Chetan Bhagat (additional screenplay), Rajat Arora (dialogue)
Info.Actors: Salman Khan, Jacqueline Fernandez, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Randeep Hooda
Info.Plot: Devi Lal Singh, a typical youth with an anomalous standard of living, tries to find pleasure in whatever he does. He eventually becomes a thief and dons a new name, Devil.
